channel.title: Sockethub
channel.description: The polyglot solution to the federated social web.
channel.author: Nick Jennings

item.title: Microformat2 & RSS news entries
item.description: Not only do we now have an RSS feed but and all of our news entries contain microformat2 attributes and can receive webmentions via. webmention.io (though we're still working on doing something with those webmentions)
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: New website
item.description: The Sockethub website has had a makeover, we're now using the awesome metalsmith static site generator to power things, this allows us to easily maintain news updates and provide an rss feed, and just generally keep things more modular.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: Release v0.3.x
item.description:
fixes to the IRC platform and improved docker support

item.title: Dogfeed RSS/Atom Reader released
item.description:
